Create a line of eco-friendly umbrellas that are made from sustainable materials and can be recycled at the end of their lifespan.
Develop an app that allows users to track the location of their lost or stolen umbrella using GPS technology.
Design a unique umbrella with a built-in solar panel that can charge a user's phone or other electronic devices on the go.
Create a line of umbrellas with different designs and patterns that can be customized by customers to reflect their personal style.
Develop a smart umbrella that can be controlled remotely using a smartphone app, allowing users to open and close the umbrella from a distance.
